tabs-tab-label:
The default label for a tabs menu. Parameter $1 stands for the index of the tab.
{{Identical|Tab}}
tabs-toggle-open:
The default opening label for toggle boxes.
{{identical|Show content}}
tabs-toggle-close:
The default closing label for toggle boxes.
{{identical|Hide content}}
tabs-dropdown-label: The default label for a dropdown menu.
tabs-dropdown-bgcolor: {{notranslate}} The default background-color for dropdown menus.
